hackathon-eligibility:
All participants must sign-up at shirts.io/hackathon to qualify.
You must upload your hack by 10am on Sunday, August 17
hackathon-requirements:
Must submit the following to qualify for judging:
- Screenshots of app/project/etc
- Explanation of creation
- Provide a walk-through of final product
- Explain which platform(s) your creation is intended for and who is your target user
hackathon-rules:
Must upload your hack by 10am on Sunday, August 17
Your idea must be created within the 48 hour window
You cannot start coding until you arrive at the hackathon
You will be judged on execution, ability to meet the deadline, concept and creativity

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: 2nd place gets $5K of Scalable Press credits, $1000 Facebook ad credits, and 3 months paid subscription to Love with Food.
3rd place gets $1K of Scalable Press credits, $1000 Facebook ad credits, and 3 months paid subscription to Love with Food.

hackathon-description-header: Compete to win the ultimate start-up starter kit
